section.title: Summary of Changes in MyProxy
section.para: GT version contains MyProxy 5.4. Note that the default behavior for the myproxy-server.config cert_dir option has changed in this release. See http://lists.globus.org/pipermail/myproxy-user/2011-March/000231.html for details. See the MyProxy Release Notes for more details on this and other MyProxy versions.
